name: Seal Girl
description:
"Girl and Goblin", as a puzzle game, has many innovations, which are different from ordinary puzzles.Each picture is no longer irrelevant, but connected into a "story".There will also be a special lens after completing the puzzle. Sakura, a novice adventurer, alone in pursuit of goblin to the depths, accidentally by...

The features of "Girl and Goblin" include:
1500 achievements
13 pieces of pretty girls CG
To find out the whole story by completing the puzzle.
15 levels.
Open cheating according to "F"
Stay at least 10 seconds at each level to activate all achievements
